publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2919.1 Colin Fox: Abolition of Prescription Charges for Chronic Conditions—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2919) in the name of Shona Robison, leave out from “prioritise” to end and insert “abolish prescription charges in Scotland in line with the decision taken by the National Assembly for Wales.”
S2M-2919.1 Abolition of Prescription Charges for Chronic Conditions (lodged on 10 June 2005) Tommy Sheridan*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*
